page.title: 02HORBLING AND BILLINGBOROUGH
page.content: The villages of Billingborough and Horbling are fairly small. Billingborough has a population of approximately 850 and Horbling is smaller. They are quiet except when the R.A.F. flies low over them. They are 10 to 15 miles from 4 towns where people go to shop. There are a few factories employing some people but most people commute to the towns to work . Not many of the villagers work on the land. There is a primary school in each village and a secondary school in Billingborough .We have selection still in Lincolnshire and the children who go to Grammar Schools go to Sleaford. Billingborough has a Health Centre with 2 doctors and a nurse. Our nearest hospital is at Grantham 14 miles away. There are several shops in Billingborough but most people shop in town.
